chapter.text: By those lined up in ranks
and those who warn, crying warnings
and those who recite God's word
your God is One
Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them, Lord of every sunrise
We have adorned the nearest heaven with planets
and protected them against every rebellious devil
[so that the devils] may not listen to the highest assembly [of angels] but be repelled from every side
driven away. For them there is a continuous punishment
except for him who snatches a glimpse [of such knowledge], He will be pursued by a piercing flame
Then ask those who persist on denying the truth if they were more difficult to create than those other beings We have created, for We created them from sticky clay
No wonder you are surprised, to see them ridicule [the message]
and when they are reminded [of the Truth], they don't want to remember
and when they see a sign, they ridicule it
saying, "This is mere magic
When We have died and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected
and our forefathers too
Say, "Yes, and [on that Day of Judgment] you will be humiliated
[On that Day,] there will be only a single shout, and at once they will begin to see
They will say, "How terrible for us! This is the Day of Judgment
and [They will be told], "This is the Day of separation [between the good and the bad], which you used to deny
[The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who were unjust, all those like them, and the idols they used to worship
instead of God, and show them to the path of Hell
And stop them, for they are to be questioned
Why do you not help each other now
No, today they come in absolute submission
and they will turn on one another, questioning each other
[Some] will say, "You used to approach us from a position of power
The others will say, "No, you [yourselves] were not believers
and we had no authority over you, but you were exceedingly arrogant people
Our Lord's Word has been carried out against us, and we will all taste punishment
We misled you, and we were ourselves misled
On that Day, they will share in the punishment
for that is how We deal with those who forced others to reject Our messages
Whenever they were told, "There is no god but God," they became arrogant
and would say, "Are we to give up our gods for a mad poet
Rather, the Prophet has come with the Truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers
You [who deny the truth] will taste the painful punishment
and you will be repaid only for what you used to do
Not so for God's devoted worshipers
they will have recognizable provision
of fruits, and they will be honored
in Gardens of delight
[resting] on couches and facing one another
A cup from a flowing spring will be passed among them
white and delicious to the drinkers
which will neither sicken nor intoxicate them
With them are mates of modest gaze with beautiful eyes
just like closely guarded pearls
They will turn to one another, inquiring
One of them says" I used to have a friend [on earth]
who used to say to me, are you of those who believe
that, when we have died and become dust and bones, we will be brought for judgment
And he will add, "Shall we look for him
And he looks and sees [his former companion] in the midst of Hell
He says to him, "By God, you almost ruined me
Were It not for the grace of my Lord, I would have been with those taken [to Hell]
Then, [he says to those in paradise], "Will we really not die
except for our first death, and will we really not be punished
Truly, this is the ultimate success
This is what everyone should strive to attain
Is Paradise a better place to be, or the tree of Bitterness
We have made [this tree] a punishment for the unjust
It is a tree that grows in the heart of Hell
Its fruit like devils' heads
and [the people in Hell] will eat from it and fill their bellies with it
On top of that, they will have a boiling brew to drink
Then they will return to Hell
for they found their fathers misguided
so they rushed [to follow] in their footsteps
Most of the earlier peoples went astray before them
though We had already sent them someone to give warning
Look, then, at the final fate of those who were warned
except for the devout worshipers of God
Noah called Us, and how excellent was Our response
We saved him and his family from the great distress
We made his descendants the survivors
and left for him [favorable mention] among later generations
Peace upon Noah, among all people
This is how we reward those who do good
for he was among Our believing worshipers
We drowned the rest
Abraham was like him
He came to his Lord with a faultless heart
and said to his father and his people, "What are you worshiping
Are you fooling yourselves by choosing false gods other than God
What do you think about the Lord of the worlds
Then he took a look at the stars
and said, "I am sick [of you worshipping these]
so they turned away from him and left
Then he turned to their gods and said, "Will you not eat
What is wrong with you that you do not speak
And he turned on them, striking them with his right hand
His people came rushing back to him
He said, "How can you worship that which you [yourselves] carve
while God created you and everything you do
They said, "Construct a furnace and throw him into the burning fire
They plotted against him, but We humiliated them
[Abraham] said, "I will go away to my Lord, He will guide me
My Lord, grant me a righteous son
So We gave him the good news of a gentle boy

And when [the boy] was old enough to work with him, he said, "My son, I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "My father, do as you are ordered. You will find me, God willing, patient
But as soon as they had both submitted to [what they thought to be] God's will, and [Abraham] had laid [his son] down on the side of his face
We called to him, "Abraham
you have fulfilled the vision." This is how we reward those who do good
This was clearly a grave trial
and We ransomed him with a great sacrifice
and We left the later generations saying of him
Peace be upon Abraham
This is how we reward those who do good
for [Abraham] was among Our believing worshipers
Then We gave him the good news of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous
and We blessed him and Isaac. Among their descendants are doers of good, and those who clearly wrong themselves
We certainly showed great kindness to Moses and Aaron
We saved them and their people from a terrible predicament
and We supported them so that they prevailed
and We gave them the clarifying Book
and We guided them on the straight path
and We left the later generations saying of them
Peace be upon Moses and Aaron
This is how We reward those who do good
for they were among Our believing worshipers
Elijah was indeed one of the messengers
When he said to his people, "Will you not remain mindful of God
Do you call upon Baal and leave the best of creators
God, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers
But they denied him, so they will be brought [for punishment]
except for God's devout worshipers
And We left the later generations saying of him
Peace be upon the House of Elijah
This how we reward those who do good
for he was among Our believing worshipers
Lot was indeed one of the messengers
We saved him and all of his family
except an old woman who stayed behind
Then We destroyed the others
You pass by them morning
and night, so will you not use your reason
Jonah was one of the messengers
He ran away to an loaded ship
but they cast lots, and he lost
[so they threw him into the sea], and a great fish swallowed him, for He was blameworthy [for what he had done]
And had he not been one of those who glorify God's limitless glory
he would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected
But We cast him, ill, on an open shore
and We made a gourd vine to grow over him
and We sent him to a hundred thousand people or more
They believed, so We let them enjoy their life
So [Prophet] inquire [of the idolaters], "Why do they think their Lord has daughters while they have sons
Or, maybe they witnessed the creation of the angels as females
No indeed, It is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say
God has begotten," and they are liars
Has He chosen daughters over sons
What is [wrong] with you? How do you reach your judgments
Will you not be reminded [of the warning against such thinking]
Or do you have a clear authority [for what you allege]
Then, produce your Book, if you are truthful
They also claimed a lineage between Him and the jinn, but the jinn know that they will be brought before Him for [judgment]
May God be exalted in His glory above all they describe
except for God's devout worshipers [who don't make such claims]
So you [who deny the truth] and whatever you worship
cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
except for him who will burn in Hell
[All of God's creations will say], "Among us, too, there is none but has a known place
We are ranged in ranks
and we are those who glorify God
The unbelievers used to say
If only we had a message from those who lived before us
we would have been faithful worshipers of God
But they rejected the message, so they will soon realize [the consequences]
Our word has already been given to Our worshiping Messengers
[that] they would indeed be victorious
and [that] Our soldiers will be those who overcome
So [Prophet], leave them for a time
And watch them, for they will soon see
Do they really want to hasten Our punishment
When it descends on them, how terrible will that morning be for those who were warned
Leave them for a time
and watch them, for they will soon see
May your Lord, the Lord of Might, be exalted in His glory above all they describe
And Peace be on the Messengers
and praise be to God, Lord of the worlds
